meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a microcosm.
meanings.sent1: The tiny village was a microcosmic representation of the larger city.
meanings.sent2: The microcosmic world of insects is fascinating to study.
meanings.sent3: In the microcosmic world of ants, a crumb can be a feast.
meanings.sent4: Her dollhouse was a microcosmic kingdom where she ruled as queen.
meanings.sent5: The pond was a microcosmic universe teeming with life.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to small-scale representation or analysis.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a microcosmic model of the solar system.
meanings.sent2: The microcosmic details in the painting were breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: In the microcosmic world of dollhouses, every detail matters.
meanings.sent4: The tiny snow globe was a microcosmic winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed a microcosmic world invisible to the naked eye.
